attributes.action: acknowledge the widelheld support of Trident
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trident is vital, I shall list some of the reasons:

An effective detterrent, preventing another Cold War, as no hostile power knows where our nuclear submamarines are at any time, giving the possibility that we can strike anywhere in the world.

No other powers would follow suit if we disarmed, this would just be another crippling blow to Britannia's military strength.

To disarm would void all the investment in our nuclear arsenal by many previous politicians of note, who obviously thought it was worthwhile.

Without this protection Britain would be vunerable to all other regimes who are developing, acquiring nuclear weapons (Putin sold defence systems to Iran, don't you think he'd sell warheads at the right price?)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
